Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute near Grand/Springfield
ShortDescription: 65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Pulaski, Division, Hamlin, Grand and over the regular route due to, street blockage near Grand/Springfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Pulaski, Division, Hamlin, Grand and over the regular route due to, street blockage near Grand/Springfield.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lafayette/83rd
ShortDescription: Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 83rd, King Drive, 87th & Lafayette, due to police department activity near Lafayette/83rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 83rd, King Drive, 87th & Lafayette, due to police department activity near Lafayette/83rd.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Southbound Temporary #54 Cicero Reroute near Cicero/Cermak
ShortDescription: Southbound 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Cermak, Kenton, Cermak and Cicero, due to street blockage near Cicero/Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Cermak, Kenton, Cermak, then resume their normal route on Cicero, due to street blockage near Cicero/Cermak.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
